queries.by_point:
select tzid
from
    timezones
where
    within(GeomFromText('POINT(' || :longitude || ' ' || :latitude || ')'), timezones.Geometry)
    and rowid in (
        SELECT pkid FROM idx_timezones_Geometry
        where xmin < :longitude
        and xmax > :longitude
        and ymin < :latitude
        and ymax > :latitude
    )
